name: photo-filter-monorepo
description: A monorepo containing both the Photo Filter backend (Express.js) and frontend (Ember.js).

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: npm --prefix backend run build || echo 'No build script for backend'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: npm --prefix backend run lint || echo 'No lint script for backend'
scripts.super-dev: npm run bootstrap:dev && node backend/utils/index-refresh.js && concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND,TEST-BE,TEST-FE,OVERVIEW -c cyan,green,yellow,magenta,blue "npm run watch:backend" "npm run watch:frontend" "npm run watch:test:backend" "npm run watch:test:frontend" "npm run watch:overview"
scripts.watch:test:backend: npm --prefix backend run test:watch || echo 'No watch test script for backend'
scripts.watch:overview: nodemon --watch backend --watch frontend --ext js,ts,hbs,sh,md --ignore project-overview.txt --exec "npm run generate-overview"
